text:
HATES SHARING LIMELIGHT WITH KELLY, craves return to L.A. and new ‘Idol’.

THE honeymoon is over for Ryan Seacrest and Kelly Ripa! With the daytime duo’s ratings tanking on “Live,” Ryan’s racing to head back to Hollywood — and host the “American Idol” reboot!

“Ryan yearns to get back home to California,” snitched a source.

“It didn’t take long for him to realize he’d made a big mistake moving to New York to co-host ‘Live.’ He was top dog on ‘Idol,’ but he’s second banana to Kelly, and it annoys him.”

Ryan, 42, signed a fat deal worth at least $10 million to appear on “Live,” but longs for L.A. and misses his parents, who he’d moved into a ritzy home just a stone’s throw from his palatial $49 million estate.

“Ryan’s been moaning about missing his life in Los Angeles,” dished the source. “He feels claustrophobic in New York. He’s rattled by all the noise and the traffic!”

Now the sharp-dressed dude is angling to seal a megabucks deal with “Idol” producers!

Ryan’s been negotiating with ABC after the network initially offered him about half the $25 million they’re paying Katy Perry to join the reboot as a judge.

ABC sweetened the deal with superstar perks, insiders said —
title: Seacrest Walks Out On Live!

meta_data.description: Seacrest Walks Out On Live!, recent article from National Enquirer Magazine July 31 2017. HATES SHARING LIMELIGHT WITH KELLY, craves return to L.A. and new ‘Idol’.
